name: serverless-lambda-boilerplate
description: boilerplate for creating serverless microservices with serverless framework and aws lambda. es6 with babel transpiler, and mocha unit tests runner

scripts.test: ./node_modules/.bin/babel-node node_modules/.bin/babel-istanbul cover --include-all-sources --root ./src node_modules/.bin/_mocha --report text --check-coverage -- --timeout 5000 -u tdd --recursive tests/**
scripts.test-report: ./node_modules/.bin/babel-node node_modules/.bin/babel-istanbul cover --include-all-sources --root ./src node_modules/.bin/_mocha --report lcovonly -- --timeout 5000 -u tdd --recursive tests/** && cat ./coverage/lcov.info | ./node_modules/coveralls/bin/coveralls.js && rm -rf ./coverage
scripts.redeploy: npm run clean && cp src/config.js build/ && cp package.json build/ && cp src/serverless.yml build/ && npm run install:prod && npm run build:app && npm run deploy:app && npm run build:doc && npm run deploy:doc

author: Roman Shuvaryk <xcomanche@gmail.com>
